content.rendered: A gap in the clouds and drizzle revealed sunshine and blue skies for a brief moment on 2 January and by remarkable chance this coincided perfectly with my shoot with the brilliant Betty Steeles. We met in Highgate’s Pond Square for an Amelie-esque session with a collection of quirky props.
